comments.description: ACT policy training configuration for PandaPickCubeSpacemouse-v0 imitation learning
comments.task: Pick and place cube using SpaceMouse demonstrations
comments.policy_choice: ACT (Action Chunking Transformer) - standard choice for imitation learning
comments.image_preprocessing: Images are cropped and resized to 128x128 as per data collection config
comments.state_vector: 18-dim state: 7 joint positions + 7 joint velocities + 4 EE pose elements
comments.action_space: 4-dim actions: delta XYZ position + gripper state
comments.extensibility: This configuration is designed to be compatible with Isaac Sim environment
